desc: The Buttress Pillow combines a marshmallow-soft and silky smooth pillow with the magic and happiness of the perfect Booty. Great for all kinds of sleepers, squeezers, nappers and slappers. Featuring our 100% natural latex foam core, washable yoga-pant cover and flexible thighs to gently cradle your head.

layout.text: The soft, comfortable and functional pillow with the peace happiness of a very nice butt.
